info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 10:28PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Custer, northwestern Powder River and Rosebud Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1027 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles northwest of Miles City to near Ashland to 26 miles southeast of Busby. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Miles City, Broadus, Volborg, Ashland, Rosebud, Birney, Locate, Cartersville, Strawberry Hill Recreation Area, Matthews Recreation Area, Birney Village, Olive, Hathaway, Otter, Twelve Mile Dam, Sonnette, Brandenberg, Garland, Moon Creek Ranch and Mizpah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
